title: Database Modeling Education Utilizing Visual Abstraction Hierarchy Transition

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Learners experience database modeling processes step-by-step through real project cases and learn transitions between visual abstraction layers using digital tools

learning_goals: Learners can design database schemas by applying the 4-level TSSL model (task-meaning-syntax-lexicon levels).
Learners can reduce errors by over 30% when converting from ER diagrams to relational schemas.
Learners can explain the gradual transition process between abstraction layers using visual tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
